ModMetaData.name: Body Power: Bill Tab Editon

ModMetaData.description:
Version: 1. With Orginal Authors permission this is a Re-upload with a Bill tab added.
Adds a Generator which is powered by dead foes, to provide your colony electricity the right way!. Orginal mod by Begginfokillz https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=783259740
